Autumn

Scenario: The Halcyon Class Cruiser Pillar of Autumn is being invaded by the Covenant

Objective 1: Protect the Engine Room

  • Objective 1A: Repel Covenant boarding parties from the Escape Pod Bays
    • Reward: Less enemy spawns in O2
  • Objective 1B: Escort injured UNSC personnel to the Med Bays
    • Reward: More ally spawns in O2
  • Objective 1C: Defend the Armory rooms
    • Reward: Allies spawn with better weapons in O2

Twist: Captain Keyes is going down with the ship, escape the Pillar of Autumn

Objective 2: Board a Bumblebee

  • Objective 2A: Backup isolated UNSC personnel
    • Reward 2A: More ally spawns in Halo
  • Objective 2B: Use the Autumn's Weapons to destroy Covenant Vehicles
    • Reward 2B: Less enemy spawns in Halo
  • Objective 2C: Kill a Sangheili Zealot
    • Reward 2C: O2C automatically completed in Halo

Conclusion: Barely escaped

Weapons:

  • Sidekick
  • Submachine Gun
  • Machete
  • Plasma Pistol
  • Plasma Rifle
  • Energy Sword
  • Mauler
  • Spiker
  • Smasher

Grenade:

  • Blast Grenade

  • Remote Battery

  • Scrap Pile
  • Trip Mine
  • Flare
